channel.title: hugo on Xi Wang
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Xi Wang

item.title: Setup Your Own Blog (Custom Domain Name)
item.description: Used Tools hugo + github.io + custom domain name Install hugo brew install hugo hugo new site myblog search themes hugo server -D hugo server -t –buildDrafts hugo new post/blog.md hugo –theme=m10c –baseUrl=“https://xidaniel.github.io/" –buildDrafts cd public/ git init git add . git commit -m “My first submit” git remote add origin https://github.com/xidaniel/xidaniel.github.io.git git push -u origin master Update Post hugo -D //generate new public hugo server -D //locally review
